com.samsung.android.sdk.accessory

Class SAPeerAccessory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.accessory.SAPeerAccessory

  • public class SAPeerAccessory
extends Object
    This class represents a remote Accessory Device visible on one of the supported transports.

    Developer Guides

    For more information about using Accessory, read the Accessory programming guide.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TRANSPORT_BLE
      Bluetooth Low Energy(Bluetooth v4.0) transport type.
      static int TRANSPORT_BT
      Bluetooth transport type.
      static int TRANSPORT_USB
      USB transport type.
      static int TRANSPORT_WIFI
      Wi-Fi transport type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAccessoryId()
      Get the unique Accessory ID of this remote Accessory Device.
      String getAddress()
      Get the address of the remote Accessory Device.
      String getName()
      Get the human readable friendly name of the remote Accessory Device.
      String getProductId()
      Get the product ID of the remote Accessory Device.
      int getTransportType()
      Get the transport type supported by the remote Accessory Device.
      String getVendorId()
      Get the vendor ID of the remote Accessory Device.

    • Method Detail

      • getAddress

        public String getAddress()
        Get the address of the remote Accessory Device. This method assumes the Accessory Device is connected over a single transport only.
        Returns:
        The device address.
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Get the human readable friendly name of the remote Accessory Device.
        Returns:
        The name of remote Accessory Device
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • getProductId

        public String getProductId()
        Get the product ID of the remote Accessory Device.
        Returns:
        The product ID of remote Accessory Device.
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • getTransportType

        public int getTransportType()
        Get the transport type supported by the remote Accessory Device. This method assumes the Accessory Device is connected over a single transport only.
        Returns:
        one of transport types defined by SAPeerAccessory
        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        TRANSPORT_BT, TRANSPORT_BLE, TRANSPORT_WIFI, TRANSPORT_USB

      • getVendorId

        public String getVendorId()
        Get the vendor ID of the remote Accessory Device.
        Returns:
        The vendor ID.
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • getAccessoryId

        public String getAccessoryId()
        Get the unique Accessory ID of this remote Accessory Device.
        Returns:
        The unique Accessory ID.
        Since:
        2.1.8
